pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generate 'BART' File // A set of functions to generate and format results from statistical analyses of a wide range of high throughput experiments that can then be uploaded into the 'BART' (Bio-Statistical Analysis Reporting Tool) 'shiny' app https://github.com/jcardenas14/BART. The app provides users with tools to visualize and efficiently sift through large amounts of data and results.
